class.name: GFQueryBuilder
class.description: Queries are the main way entities are accessed from a [GFWorld]. Under the hood, systems and observers both use queries. The example below shows the creation of a query over entities with the [i]Jump[/i] component: [codeblock] var query:GFQuery = QueryBuilder.new() \ .with("Jump") \ .build() [/codeblock]

method.name: build
method.description: Builds and returns the new query.

method.name: new_in_world
method.description: Returns a new builder in [param world].
